We recognize the importance of Adobe’s impact on the environment and climate through our own operations and supply chain,  
as well as our ability to make a positive impact through our products and services. The following metrics demonstrate some of  
the ways Adobe is contributing to the United Nations Sustainable Development Goals of: 12. Responsible Consumption and 
Production and 13. Climate Action.
